title: Is Bad Credit Really That Bad?
description:
On today’s Loose Change episode, Berna is back with Piggy and Kitty from Bitches Get Riches to continue their conversation about credit. They discuss some more tips about approaching credit in a responsible way and avoid falling into a debt hole. Then, Piggy and Kitty share their own personal relationship with credit currently and how they think about these issues in their daily lives. Be sure to follow us @whenshappyhr to send in your questions!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
